function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Varying credit guarantee ratios for different countries and banks","Impact":"Inefficiency and lack of transparency in the financial mechanism, potential for unequal support for banks","Mitigation":"Standardize credit guarantee ratios based on specific criteria such as financial soundness and macroeconomic climate","Technologies":"Financial risk assessment tools, data analytics, standardized regulations","People":"Governments, financial institutions, international financial organizations","Owner":"Governments, financial regulators"},{"Description":"Increased credit guarantee ratios in ASEAN Member States due to COVID-19","Impact":"Potential distortion of market dynamics, misallocation of resources, and overreliance on government support","Mitigation":"Targeted and temporary increase in credit guarantee ratios, regular review and adjustment based on economic recovery, incentivizing banks to support SMEs without continuous reliance on guarantee ratios","Technologies":"Economic modeling and forecasting tools, risk analysis software, policy evaluation frameworks","People":"Governments, central banks, ASEAN Member States, SMEs","Owner":"Governments, central banks, financial regulators, international economic organizations"}]}
